titles.title: We Are Gathered As The Body Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are gathered as the body of the Lord
And we worship Him in one accord,
For He dwells not in buildings made of stone.
He dwells within the hearts of men alone.
We are His hands. we're His feet.
We're His ears. We're His eyes.
He's the head. With His blood we are supplied.
And as our lives touch and unions form
That cannot be destroyed,
We are made visible, the body of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nos reunimos como el cuerpo del Señor
De acuerdo y en adoración
Pues en casa de piedra no habita Dios
Sino El mora en el corazón.
Somos sus manos y sus pies
Sus oídos y sus ojos
El es cabeza y por su sangre nos provee
Y mientras toca nuestras vidas
Forma uniones irrompibles
Somos el cuerpo visible del Señor.
